thread.title: Vox Populi: 'Hey drivers: There is no charge to use your turn signals. It's actually free!'
thread.title_full: Vox Populi: 'Hey drivers: There is no charge to use your turn signals. It's actually free!' | savannahnow.com

author: DispatchDaemon
title: Vox Populi: 'Hey drivers: There is no charge to use your turn signals. It's actually free!'
text:
“New drinking game: Every time Bernie Sanders mentions another free government program, chug somebody else’s beer.”
“Brilliant! How many trucks were involved in the Truman Extension or Diamond Causeway improvement? How many lawn chairs needed for us all to watch the rest of the world pass us by?”
“Hey drivers: There is no charge to use your turn signals. It’s actually free!”
“I wonder has anyone asked the patrol officer what he or she would do differently, what may work and what may not. All the police officers I worked with had some great ideas. We just needed approval and, most importantly, the backing of our bosses.”
“Great that Georgia Power has replaced their high pressure sodium street lighting with LEDs, all 16,164 of them. However what about the city owned, historic lamp posts in and around most of our downtown squares? While they are certainly more attractive than the “poles” by Georgia Power, their illumination is still the “orange/pink” glow. When will the city officials follow the lead to LED by Georgia Power and replace the bulbs in their lamp posts with security enhancing and night sky friendly LED lighting?”
